title: 1971 Chevrolet Corvette

description: For sale in our Atlanta showroom is a sultry 1970 Chevrolet Corvette convertible. This Laguane Gray beauty is quite a find. This '70 Corvette for sale is powered by a 350 cubic inch small block Chevy V8 engine. Built for performance and reliability, this Vette was a car that was no slouch on the streets, to say the least. With a humble rumble coming from dual exhaust, this is the classic late 60s sports car you've been dreaming about. A real classic in anyone's mind, this C3 Corvette for sale is ready for miles upon miles of fun! Backing the Chevy V8 is a 4-speed manual transmission. Easy shifting, this Corvette is a blast to drive, especially when adding in the 4-wheel disc brakes and power steering. The exterior is a sexy shade of Laguane Gray. The fine Metallic hugs every curve and sparkles when hit with sunlight. This exterior is subtle, with just enough "pop" to turn heads. With the top down, this Vette is the epitome of a cool cruising 70s muscle car! Add in the factory style rally wheels, and you have a vehicle that's a complete throwback! Sitting on the inside of the cab, you feel like you've been taken back in time to the late 70s. The Red interior is original style and looks absolutely delicious when matched with the Metallic Gray exterior. Sitting in this 1970 Chevy Corvette convertible for sale is like jumping into a cockpit. The shifter just begs to be grabbed. Options on this 1970 Chevrolet Corvette convertible for sale, include: AM/FM radio, manual convertible top, power steering, power windows, seat belts, and rally wheels wrapped in radial tires. This little C4 Corvette is a fun cruiser and is ready for its next adventure! For more information please call the Atlanta showroom at 678-894-4833 or e-mail us at Atlanta@GatewayClassicCars.com.
title: 1970 Chevrolet Corvette

description: Dennis Buys Cars is pleased to offer this incredible beast of an automobile. It is a two owner California car with the second owner having it since 1973 until he passed away recently. It was born as an LS-5 with a 454 and changed to a Chevy Crate 502 in 1998.

Many receipts are available including: Installation of the 502. In 1981 it received the professionally done fender flares and three stage Pearl White paint job at a cost of $4,100 which is equivalent to over $11,000 today. Installation of MSD electronic ignition and installation of George Nash 4+1 5-Speed transmission as well as many service records and upgrades.
With the headers, racing dual exhaust with cutouts and high duration cam I am sure the horsepower is in the 500HP range.
It fires right up, runs and sound great. It pulls incredibly strong and has no negative driveability issues. All gauges work, AC is not working.
The body is super straight with no cracks but the 36 year old paint is starting to show its age with checking here and there.
Chrome and glass are excellent. Upholstery is like new and there are no cracks on the dash.

This is a tasteful restomod of its day done by someone who liked to go fast. Tidy it up yourself with new paint or enjoy it just the way it is. Clean title in hand and current CA registration. Smog exempt.

"Face Time" Tours Now Available. Trades are WELCOME. We do not offer financing on this vehicle. We handle all DMV hassle, all you do is drive off! Prices do not include tax, license and any other applicable fees. Se habla Espanol.

Are you SELLING or TRADING a car? WE BUY CARS, TRUCKS, MOTORCYCLES and CLASSICS TOO. Call us now or go to http//dennisbuyscars.com for a FREE consultation and quote or to see our full inventory of cars for sale.
We are DennisBuysCars.com, Inc. 8931 Venice Blvd., L.A., CA. 90034 between Robertson and National. Hours Mon-Sat 9-6PM, Sunday 10-5PM. Thanks for looking, Dennis. Tel. 310-253-9977
WE DO NOT RESPOND TO EMAILS ASKING IF THE CAR IS STILL AVAILABLE.

description: This CHEVROLET CORVETTE is one that you really need to take out for a test drive to appreciate. Want that 'new car' smell?  This car still has it, because it has never been smoked in.   The powerful V8 engine accelerates strongly and more than holds its own in the toughest of traffic. Grip the road like never before with this  sports tuned suspension.   It is obvious that the previous owner took really good care of it because the exterior finish is immaculate. Absolutely no interior maintenance is needed on this car. Rest easy knowing that all of the major mechanical systems have been checked and are confirmed to be in great shape and road ready. Unless you plan on driving this one straight into a mud pit you won't have to worry about any exterior maintenance for quite some time. You will not find any tears, rips, or stains on the interior, and it is unusually clean for a used vehicle.   We are only minutes away from Dracut, stop by and visit us today. ¿Quieres el 'olor a auto Nuevo'? Esta el coche todavía lo tiene, porque nunca se ha fumado en el.   El motor V8 potente acelera fuertemente y más que tiene lo suyo en lo más duro del tráfico. Agarre la carretera como nunca antes con la afinada suspensión deportiva de esteel coche .   Es obvio que el dueño anterior tomo un buen cuidado, porque el acabado exterior esta impecable. Absolutamente no se necesita ningún mantenimiento interior en este el coche. Descanse sabiendo que todos los sistemas principales an sido revisados y comfirmados que estan en gran forma y listos para el camino.. A menos que usted planee conducir éste directamente a un pozo de barro, no tendrá que preocuparse por ningún tipo de mantenimiento exterior por bastante tiempo. Usted no encontrará ningún desgarro, roturas o manchas en el interior, y esta inusualmente limpio para un vehículo usado.   Estamos a sólo minutos de distancia del Dracut, paramos y visítenos hoy.

description: This is a very nice example of a 1971 Corvette. This is a T-top coupe and was originally manufactured as an LT-1 model. The original LT-1 emblems have remained however the original motor at some point was replaced with a period correct after market V8 engine. With that exception this car is stock. It has been repainted but in the original color that it was manufactured. The original radio is still installed however there is a modern (blue tooth) equipped stereo under the back floor panel that you can plug your phone into for music. It is also a four speed car as all LT-1's were and is showing 78,500 miles on the odometer although it is exempt due to its age. If you are looking for a bumper car in great condition consider this one for your collection or garage. It is a very nice older vette at a very nice price. Call Dan @ 954 802 0400 or Bill @ 954 410 6252 for additional information.
